text.name: Ritual dagger
text.description: Allows to upgrade all Mages, Archmages, Monks and Zealots in your army to Liches
text.event: In a dark, mist-shrouded grove, you unearth the Ritual Dagger. Its blade is etched with eerie symbols of necromancy. As you take hold of it, a sinister power begin to resonate within your army.
